Title: Only Old Men Are Going to Battle
Writer: Leonid Bykov, Yevgeni Onopriyenko, Aleksandr Satsky
Actors: Leonid Bykov, Sergei Podgornyj, Sergei Ivanov, Rustam Sagdullaev
Plot: Stunning WWII flying sequences as the Soviet Air Force battles the Luftwaffe. Veteran Russian pilots teach their new recruits about life, death & love. When the older men fly into battle, will the young pilots be ready to fight - and how many will return?
